name.ch: 太空電離層資料同化導論

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程目標為向授課學生教授電離層資料同化的相關基礎知識。在學習資料同化方法的同時，也認識相關電離層模式和增加對衛星資料特性的瞭解。並從電腦上機學習以及準備專題研究報告，熟悉程式繪圖以及學習組織科學研究項目。
goal.en: “This course aims to teach the students the basic knowledge of ionospheric data assimilation. Students will also understand the relevant ionospheric models and satellite data while learning the data assimilation method. Preparing a research report will help students increase their program coding skills and organize scientific research projects.“

outline.ch: 本課程將著重電離層資料同化最主要的三個基礎知識，電離層模式、衛星觀測資料、以及資料同化方法。課程將先介紹相關衛星資料基礎知識以及資料處理方法，並介紹相關電離層模式以及操作模式，然後介紹各種資料同化的方法，最後介紹如何運用同化的方法將衛星資料同化到電離層模式。此課程除了口頭傳授授課內容以外，亦有電腦程式上機練習操作電離層模式、處理衛星觀測資料、以及學習使用同化方法。在學期中開始進行分組專題研究，並在學期末進行分組報告。
outline.en: “This course will focus on the three basic knowledge of ionospheric data assimilation: ionospheric model, satellite data, and data assimilation method. The course will first introduce the basic knowledge of satellite observation data, the relevant ionospheric models, and various data assimilation methods. Then, we will introduce how to use the assimilation method to assimilate satellite data into the ionospheric model. In addition to the oral teaching content, this course also has computer programming to practice using the ionosphere model, processing satellite observation data, and learning to use the assimilation method. Group research begins during the semester and reports via oral presentation and paper document at the end of the semester.“

gradMethod.ch: 平時成績 20％、平時作業30％、期末口頭報告20％、期末書面報告30％
gradMethod.en:
“Attendance and class participation 20％
Homework 30％
Final presentation 20％
Final Paper report 30％“

flexDiscription.ch: 課程包含專題研究，授課週數依專題研究需求調整。
flexDiscription.en: The course includes particular research, and the number of teaching weeks is adjusted according to the research needs.
